description: Introducing AcaseView from Acase Products line for Kindle Fire- the most elegant, cost-effective, and convenient way to protect the screen of your coveted device. Acase(TM) AcaseView Premium Screen Protector for Kindle Fire is made from superior quality 3-layer PET film imported from Japan. The film ensures zero-to-minimal bubbles during application, applies easily, and is reusable. The film takes all the abuse and protects your Kindle Fire screen from scratches, dust, normal signs of wear. It has just the right level of thickness - not too thin to be ineffective, yet not too thick to impede the touch feature of your device. It allows you to use your device with ease. Apply the AcaseView to Kindle Fire and you will forget it's even there, yet your Kindle Fire screen will have the protection it needs.Compatible with the latest generation Kindle Fire , Full Color 7" Multi-touch Display, 2011 ModelTry it - from the best kindle Case manufacture to add additional protector to your Kindle
title: Acase Amazon Kindle Fire Screen Protector Film - Premium Anti-Fingerprint, Anti-Glare (Matte Finishing) (3 Pack)
